text: Akama may refer to: * Akama, a historical district in Munakata, Fukuoka, Japan * Akama Shrine, a Shinto shrine in Shimonoseki, Yamaguchi Prefecture, Japan * Akama Station, a train station in Munakata, Fukuoka, Japan * Akamas (Turkish: Akama), a promontory in northwest Cyprus * Denkichi Akama, a character in the Akira Kurosawa film The Idiot * Jiro Akama, a Japanese politician
title: Akama
